column4: how to share a ressources between two PC under ubuntu, it's possible via samba?
What resources?  Just file shares?  NFS might be a better choice maybe?
i can use NFS to perform this?
I don't know if NFS or Samba is the better choice if every system is Linux.  I tend to think NFS but who knows.  Samba would be convenient if you have Windows machines that want to connect as well.
